Question
========

Answerlist
----------
* How many units an observation is above or below the mean, expressed on a scale ranging from -1.96 to +1.96.
* How many units an observation is above or below the mean, expressed in standard deviation units.
* How many units an observation is above or below the standard deviation is, expressed on a scale ranging from -1.96 to +1.96.
* How many units an observation is above or below the standard deviation is, expressed on a scale ranging from 0 to 1.
* How many units an observation is above or below the value 0, expressed on a scale ranging from -1 to +1.
